main event: An unidentified aerial object was observed over Washington, D.C. on 15 November 1952 by multiple witnesses.
interesting points: The object was described as emitting red, green, and white lights., It was observed by ten members of A.F.C. Security Forces who suspected it might be a satellite., The sighting occurred between 6:45 p.m. and 7:15 p.m., with varying opinions on its nature., The object was initially reported as moving fast but was later considered to be practically motionless., The observation lasted for about 20 minutes and did not conform to any normal aerial phenomena.
witness description: Members of the A.F.C. Security Forces.
